\begin{document}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]
\node[](0)at(0,0.0)
{\scalebox{1}{1/2/3}};

\node[](1)at(-3.0,2.5)
{\scalebox{1}{12/3}};

\node[](2)at(0.0,2.5)
{\scalebox{1}{13/2}};

\node[](3)at(3.0,2.5)
{\scalebox{1}{1/23}};

\node[](4)at(0,5.0)
{\scalebox{1}{123}};

\draw(0.north)--(1.south);
\draw(0.north)--(2.south);
\draw(0.north)--(3.south);
\draw(1.north)--(4.south);
\draw(2.north)--(4.south);
\draw(3.north)--(4.south);
\end{tikzpicture}
